title: World War I. The Day the guns stopped firing: 1918
brief_description: Focuses on events influencing Germany’s decision to ask for a negotiated settlement of World War I; the reaction of Germany and the Allies to news of the armistice; and the long range implications of peace. Narrated by Robert Ryan.
